Uses of Class
io.permazen.JClass

  • Packages that use JClass 
    Package Description
    io.permazen
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    io.permazen.vaadin
    Classes to facilitate Vaadin applications that interact with a Permazen database.
    io.permazen.vaadin.app
    Support for Permazen GUI applications based on Vaadin.

    • Uses of JClass in io.permazen

      Methods in io.permazen that return JClass 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> JClass<? super T> Permazen.findJClass(Class<T> type)
      Find the most specific JClass for which the give type is a sub-type of the corresponding Java model type.
      default JClass<?> JObject.getJClass()
      Get the JClass of which this JObject is an instance.
      <T> JClass<T> Permazen.getJClass(Class<T> type)
      Get the JClass modeled by the given type.
      JClass<?> Permazen.getJClass(int storageId)
      Get the JClass associated with the given storage ID.
      JClass<?> Permazen.getJClass(ObjId id)
      Get the JClass associated with the object ID.
      Methods in io.permazen that return types with arguments of type JClass 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SortedMap<Integer,JClass<?>> Permazen.getJClasses()
      Get all JClass's associated with this instance, indexed by storage ID.
      <T> List<JClass<? extends T>> Permazen.getJClasses(Class<T> type)
      Get all JClasses which sub-type the given type.
      Map<Class<?>,JClass<?>> Permazen.getJClassesByType()
      Get all JClass's associated with this instance, indexed by Java model type.
      Methods in io.permazen with parameters of type JClass 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T JTransaction.create(JClass<T> jclass)
      Create a new instance of the given type in this transaction.
